name: Exteme Racing on Highway
description:
Race through highway traffic in this new endless racing game where you need to push the acceleration and test your car limits and receive money for your rewards and spend them on upgrades & new cars!

Instruments such as Score, Speed, Distance & High Speed will help you to have good performances and a lot of money.

Key features :
- Upgrade system for your cars
- 4 game modes
- 3 maps
- 5 cars
